thread.title: Train hero honors Oregon town on 'Dancing with the Stars'
thread.title_full: Train hero honors Oregon town on 'Dancing with the Stars'

title: Train hero honors Oregon town on 'Dancing with the Stars'
text: Train hero honors Oregon town on 'Dancing with the Stars' Tuesday, 6 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) An emotional Alek Skarlatos returned to " Dancing with the Stars" to honor his Oregon college town hit by a mass killing, calling the event harder to comprehend than the terrorist attack he helped stop in France. Train Hero Alek Skarlatos Leaves DWTS After Oregon Shooting at His College 01:08 Alex Skarlatos, one of the three brave Americans who took down a terrorist on a train to Paris was a student at Umpqua Community College in Oregon, where a gunman killed nine people on Thursday. He has now left "Dancing with the Stars" to go back home, he says that he would have probably been in... Recent related news An emotional Alek Skarlatos returned to "Dancing with the Stars" to honor his Oregon college town hit by a mass killing. NY Daily News 2 hours ago - Entertainment French train hero Skarlatos dedicates 'Dancing with the Stars' appearance to Oregon town ABCNews.com 4 hours ago - Front Page The train hero flew home following the deadly shooting People Magazine 4 hours ago - Celebrities
